title: Pochettino proud of Spurs players despite Champions League exit
text:
Pochettino proud of Spurs players despite Champions League exit 10:02am GMT - 00:56 
Tottenham Hotspur's manager Mauricio Pochettino rues missed opportunities as he reflects on the team's exit of the Champions League at the hands of Juventus. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
